    • onPartSearchClick

      public void onPartSearchClick(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
      Clears the text in the TextField when the TextField is clicked.
      Parameters:
      mouseEvent - Clicking inside the TextField

    • onPartKeyRelease

      public void onPartKeyRelease(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent keyEvent)
      Searches all Parts in Inventory for the inputted Part Name or Part Id after each keystroke. If no results are found all Part objects are displayed in the TableView. RUNTIME ERROR: Initially the selected Part would not be visible in the TableView unless that section of the TableView was already in view. This was fixed by implementing the .scrollTo() method.
      Parameters:
      keyEvent - a keystroke while typing in the partTableView search bar

    • onPartSearch

      public void onPartSearch(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Searches all Parts in Inventory for the inputted Part Name or Part Id. If no results are found all Part objects are displayed in the TableView. RUNTIME ERROR: Initially the selected Part would not be visible in the TableView unless that section of the TableView was already in view. This was fixed by implementing the .scrollTo() method.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - pressing enter/return after typing in the TextField

    • initialize
